output_list.criticism: The sell function has an integer overflow where 'revenue' can be zero, reducing a seller's assets.
The transfer function has an integer overflow where 'balanceOf[_to]' can be zero, reducing the recipient's assets.
The buy function has an integer overflow where 'amount' can be zero, reducing the buyer's assets.
The mintToken function has an integer overflow where 'mintedAmount' can be zero, reducing the total supply of tokens.
The setMinBalance function has an integer overflow where 'minBalanceForAccounts' can be zero, reducing the minimum balance for accounts.
